searchContacts.name: searchContacts
searchContacts.label: Search Contacts

expect.help:
A search for a simple value will be performed in all of the fields for the contact. To search multiple words in one value or special characters, enclose it in `"`, e.g.: `"Mary Jane"`.
To search in specific parameters, enclose it in `"`, use `AND`, `OR`, `-` (exclude) as operators, and escaped quotes `\"` for multiple words or special characters, e.g.: `"givenName:\"Mary Jane\" OR surname:Doe -Title:CEO"`. 
See more details in [Microsoft Ducumentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/ediscovery-keyword-queries-and-search-conditions?view=o365-worldwide#searchable-contact-properties).
